allow: Bash(python -c "from auth import hash_password, verify_password; pwd=''test123''; hashed=hash_password(pwd); print(''Hash:'', hashed[:20]+''...''); print(''Verify:'', verify_password(pwd, hashed))")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''.'')
from auth import hash_password, verify_password
pwd = ''test123''
hashed = hash_password(pwd)
print(''✅ Hash created:'', hashed[:30] + ''...'')
print(''✅ Verify correct password:'', verify_password(pwd, hashed))
print(''✅ Verify wrong password:'', verify_password(''wrong'', hashed))
")
